website_summaries.verdict: This vintage crossbody bag with canvas and leather trim bag can be used by men and women.
pros: Casual, eco-friendly look to this 100% cotton canvas purse with leather trim
Includes main compartment, inside cellphone holder, and zipper pocket
Shoulder strap adjustable for ease and comfort
Outside pocket flap has magnetic closure for easy access
Crazy horse genuine leather makes it look more vintage
cons: A few complaints about rips and issues with magnetic closures on the front

customer_reviews.title: very good bag
customer_reviews.text: Super! I really like this bag. It is very spacious, I can put it in your plate, purse, power bank, keys, and all sorts of little things right.
customer_reviews.author: Puresonic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this product on our overseas trip. deep pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for me! I am a teacher and always am bringing multiple bags to work, this one works as a purse and can fit my planner and tablet in it without being too bulky. The cross body strap also makes carrying it around easy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Hil

customer_reviews.title: Front inside pocket coming apart
customer_reviews.text: I actually liked the size,color and fabric of this bag. It fit my iPad in it just right. The only thing is that after a couple of months, the front pocket started seams started coming apart. Now I'm not using it because I fear that pocket will just get worse. And now it appears it is too late to return it. I suppose I could try to sew it back myself, but I've just gone back to using an older purse. If it wouldn't have been for that, this would have gotten a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: Book Hoarder Letty

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quick! Great quality bag! I use for an everyday purse. I have purchased two different colors. Big enough for what I need and small enough so I can't cram extra crap in there. Exactly what I wanted! Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I honestly LOVE IT! very durable and it fits my style ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag took some time to get used to, I have been carrying a cross body bag but not this big. I honestly LOVE IT! very durable and it fits my style perfectly with anything I wear! Revising this review the bag started falling apart the second week using it, have already replaced it with a better quality bag! This one is getting thrown away do not waste your money like I did!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunetly I returned the bag. I spent a considerable amount of time reviewing shoulder bags and decided that this canvass bag would be a good fit for me, the size and material was perfect. It seemed to be a good quality bag out of the box and I thought I had made a good choioce, but after only my second use the riveted side of the snap portion pulled out of the fabric. This created a concerned about what other issues I would have with the quality of the over all product and was concerned that it would not hold up for the long term.
customer_reviews.author: Granfalloon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag to take on vacation and I haven't changed it out since I got home 2 weeks ago. The quality is excellent and it is just the right size to hold plenty without feeling bulky. The crossbody strap is heavy quality, but still soft on my neck and shoulder, and the real leather trim is so attractive. For the price, this was an outstanding value and just what I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: A mini Marry Poppins bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take four teenage students to an out of state conference. Trust me ladies, with me having to carry EVERYONES plane, bus, trolley passes, taxi monies, tickets to the conference, SNACKS, etc. this bag here is worthy of being called a Mary Poppins bag. Heck I even carried a water bottle, my wallet, cell phone, and all of our passes without feeling like I was carrying a ton of bricks around. Totally worth the buy if you're looking for a bag that won't take up all that "room" you get on airplanes these days, and just need a bag to get the job done traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag for 3 weeks all throughout Africa and it was absolutely amazing! there's a small zipper pouch inside to keep valuables, and then there is a large zipper at the top with a flap that folds over also. Works great as a deterrent against pickpockets and the strap is adjustable so you can wear it whatever makes you comfortable. It looks exactly the same now as it did when I bought it and I used it hard for those 3 weeks. Amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DG57

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag after buying the Ross bag by the same manufacturer. This bag is great: enough room for all my stuff (and I carry a lot of things), sturdy, well made, and just my style. I can organize using 1 zipper pocket, 2 open pockets ( phone and medicine holder) and a pocket outside the zipper closure for keys, etc. Adjustable strap, too. If this bag is your style, it is well worth the price. Could be a man bogs, too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Arden

customer_reviews.title: Flawed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandson who is a senior. It’s a nice looking bag but the snaps in front are totally in the wrong place. They’re placed too high on the bag therefore, when it’s snapped there’s a big roll of fabric sticking out In the front. It makes it look ridiculous. I can’t believe the sellar hasn’t caught this flaw. I wish I had sent it back and ordered him another one. Disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: NGlass

customer_reviews.title: Stitching doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: I really want to give this five stars because it is truly exactly the bag I need for travel and eventual move to Uganda. However, my first day of using it, on the plane I noticed the stitching in the strap was not bound well. Within a few days I noticed the stitching beginning to come apart. So although in every way it's what I want and need, having the strap come apart renders it worthless. I would love to have the manufacturer reach out to me so I can get this repaired and give this five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Broke the day I got it.
customer_reviews.text: Broke the day I got it, didn't even have a chance to use it. Would never purchase from this company again. One of the snaps came off when it automatically closed and took the snap right off. I still could have used it since I wasn't planning on using the snaps anyway, but I thought if this happens, how is it going to hold up over time? Not very confident about it holding up. Besides, I shouldn't keep something that I paid over $20 for if it breaks before I even get a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: kirates

customer_reviews.title: Aibag messenger bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. This is my second one in fact. It's roomy enough for the things I need to carry, but not oversized at all. You have nice zipper pockets inside for keys and small items you want to keep safe, and convenient pockets for your phone. For me at least this is just about the perfect bag.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Faurot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for trip to Europe!
customer_reviews.text: This seems perfect for our trip to Europe. Big enough to fit a tablet, a notebook, a wallet , some snacks and a few small souvenirs. Manly enough that I can pawn it off on my husband or sons if my shoulder starts to ache. Seems well constructed and very stylish. I think I read reviews about the magnetic clasps being difficult to navigate, I can see that being the case but the main compartment also has a zip closure so I don’t worry about my valuables. It might soften up and lose structure after some use, but I intend to always keep a small notebook inside (6x8”ish) so I don’t anticipate that being a problem. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Leahy Tiarnan

customer_reviews.title: I like this bag a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag a lot. It's a sturdy canvas which is nice. It's not to heavy. I like the wide shoulder strap it doesn't dig in my shoulder. It's a good size too. Comfortable to wear all day. The only problem with the bag is that they buttons don't "attract" each other very well so you have to stop and look and match them up. Other than that love the bag!! Perfect to run after my 3 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Liz M

customer_reviews.title: Love it, easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: I have had my bag for several months now. I love it. It's easy to throw on or if I need to I can adjust the strap and wear over my shoulder. I like the flap for that extra security of sealing things in. It has just the right amount of pockets inside, one big and two small, for all my little things. It's big enough to fit two wallets (one for every day use and one for all those credit cards and gift cards!) as well as other items. Would definitely recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: EMP

customer_reviews.title: This is a cute bag, but I find the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute bag, but I find the color to be different than anticipated. I ordered the green one, and it was more grey/slate than green.I'll still keep and use it. It is a little narrow. Won't hold my sunglasses/glasses cases, phone, wallet, lip gloss pouch, and a book, so I don't think it is ideal as my travel purse. And because it is narrow, you end up stacking everything on top of each other so to get something at the bottom you have to take everything out!
customer_reviews.author: samsara

customer_reviews.title: Durable, but no pockets
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It's the perfect size and the materials seem to be durable. My only complaints are that the buttons come with plastic wrapped around them--in the process of pulling off the plastic I scratched the leather a bit, but it's barely noticeable. Some of the plastic is still stuck under the button as well. Also, there are few pockets in this thing. The puter compartment has none, and the big zippered portion has 3--two open pockets, cell phone sized on one side, and a small zippered pocket on the other, just big enough to fit a few pens. The bag itself is a nice size and versatile, but I'm a pocket fan and was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: OK bag but not quite right
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this bag, but its a little too small, really hard to get things into, or find once they're in there. If you put anything in the inside pockets the bag kind of collapses on itself which makes it hard to find things in the bag, the zipper closure doesn't open as wide as the opening of the bag...really frustrating, and the magnet closures on the flap are positioned high up on the side of the bag so if you use those the bag "closes" with a big gap at the top. But it is nice looking, very durable, and it keeps me from carying a lot of crap so I tolerate it's shortcomings.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Definitely pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a crossbody bag that wasn't too small or too big and that could take a beating with me running all over the place with kids in tow. So far it's been great. Seen well, materials are thick and don't look like they're going to rip or break any time soon. Fits my wallet, first aid kit, wipes for kids, car keys and cell phone withe a little space to spare. Zipper on the bigger compartment a nice plus. I haven't needed to wash it yet, but it looks like that won't be a problem when I do.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. It’s bigger than I thought and took some getting use to because I would put so much in the bag and get heavy. However it’s a good bag and a great style. **revision: still love this bag. It’s roomy and I love the style. Only complaint is that the bottom isn’t rigid and the sides don’t stand up. Hard to go through my bag one handed while holding an infant. The sides collapse in and makes it hard to see inside or look for something because it’s just falling all around my hand making it hard to get things out.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Wanted small messenger type bag
customer_reviews.text: This messenger bag/cross body is great as a purse, but the lining is loose and moves around. Meaning the internal section of this purse moves and shifts which is frustrating because you have to readjust the internal section when adding or removing items from that part. Design improvement would be to anchor the internal lining down with the purse outer lining, which would probably increase price. Other than this one flaw, the purse is a good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: teresa

customer_reviews.title: what is a bag that doesnt hold things well?
customer_reviews.text: this bag doesnt secure properly. i dont like loose flaps. i dont like wondering if the items i place in the outside pocket will slide out if i turn the bag the wrong way or set it down on its side. it should have a zipper too, but doesnt. its also oddly sized. its size is not quite enough for a chromebook, but too big for a whatever pad. even books dont seem to want to fit in well. its just all wrong. its messing up my feng-shui. cant have a bag messing up my zen thing man. i just cant
customer_reviews.author: unwilling participant

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It is just big enough to hold my tablet and items I used to carryin a purse, but is not too big. I've only had it a couple of weeks but it seems really welll constructed and sturdy. I don't like girly things and this is not girly but also is not overly masculine so I feel comfortable wearing it. My only complaint is that the magnets that hold the flap closed are hard to match up and close but I think I'll get used to that over time.
customer_reviews.author: RianT

customer_reviews.title: It is okay.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is made of canvas with leather end on the flap for weight. There are metal snaps on the corner of the flaps although not strong enough for my liking. The main compartment has a zipper to close it but no way to lock the zipper shut. I use this to hold noise suppression ear muffs (and a book or two) on international flights. My only real annoyance is the slope of the end of the flap. Being left handed the bag is on my left hip putting the long end of the flap in the way.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Ponder

customer_reviews.title: Coloring is not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I am overall pleased with this bag. It's just the right size and it is very light when empty. My only concern is the coloring. The strap is a blue-gray and the bag is a dusty gray. The stitching is very bright orange. That's what happens when you shop online and you don't get to see the product in person. It won't impede my (hopeful) enjoyment of the bag- but it was a bit of a buzz kill when I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: .lidds.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this bag. It holds everything I need it to, and it is neutral looking enough that my husband and I can both use it for travel. The material is pretty rugged, so there’s no worry about it getting dirty, and I don’t feel the need to baby it. Crossbody sits right where I need it to, I don’t have a strap falling off my arm to think about, and I don’t ever set my purse anywhere mindlessly anymore. I’m happy enough with this that I’ll probably get a second one at some point.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & great space
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag. The adjustable strap allows you to find the perfect fit. Using it cross-body, I’ve found it excellent for my shopping endeavors. It has perfect space...not too much to make it feel like the Hermione undetectable extension charm ...like you’re digging into the gene’s bottle. I am able to quickly find my keys, phone, a pen, & hand-sanitizer in a flash. Two pockets are more than enough for me, but there is an additional tiny pocket inside for a small wad of cash or something. I’ve received compliments on this bag. It’s simple & chic.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials
customer_reviews.text: I really like this crossbody bag amd plan to order the matching backpack. It is made of exceptional qualities such as leather, jeaned, and buttons are covered in plastic to extend its life instead of getting wet & perhaps rusting. Will recommend this brand too for hikers, travelers, students as it can be classified with North Face, Patagonia, and Kuhl to name a few I have in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Moten

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter uses this as a purse. It is not too big nor too small and it is VERY durable! She has used the same style cross body purse from another store for a couple of years and we kept having to buy a new one every couple of months because it would fall apart. This messenger bag style cross body purse is perfect and I would buy again in a heartbeat but I don't think I'll need to any time soon. As for those reviewers who say the leather scratches easy, it does but it adds to the charm of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Terri J Abdis

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in terrible condition
customer_reviews.text: I received this bag today and after opening it I immediately requested a refund. The leather on the bag arrived in terrible condition. Also, the color of the bag was not as described. The bag is more of a brownish-gray. The only part of the bag that's actually army-green is the strap. I'm so disappointed as I was really looking forward to using the bag. I will not order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Cross Body Bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a good bag, however as others have mentioned mine arrived with scratches on the leather bit. Not a deal breaker but I didn't have time to exchange it before using it on a trip. I used this as a cross body bag and it served me well for travel. It fits quite a bit, including my Kindle, mobile phone, wallet, keys, etc. And it has a nice interior pocket for things like flash drives and feminine hygiene products. For about $25 it's a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S

customer_reviews.title: With functionality improvements, this purse would be perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for durability, usefulness and I love the simple style. The design leaves a little to be desired, as the inside liner slips all the time and things get caught in it and I need to pull up on the big zippers to see the whole inside. If it had little stitching spots throughout it or if the straps we're attached higher on the body, it might work better. I think I can fix it for the time being. I love the tough materials.
customer_reviews.author: A Lo

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a loved one, some material concerns.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is as advertised and was a gift for my wife. She likes it and I think it was a worthwhile purchase considering the price. After receiving it I do wonder how long it will last but for now it's good. It works great for carrying an IPad, cell phone and chargers with IDs, and whatever else women shove in their bags, while going to the Gym or a coffee shop, the beach, whatever. It's not very expensive so you don't have to worry about it being a thief magnet and it accomplishes the job. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod Campy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS PURSE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS PURSE!!! I have been using this purse since I got it, and I have gotten several compliments on it. I love that there are two pockets inside. One smaller one, then one larger one. I use the smaller one for stuff like my keys, pens, chap stick, my phone, etc... I use the larger one for my wallet, my checkbook, any medications I need to carry with me. My mother is in love with this bag.. She keeps threatening she's going to steal it. Santa may be bringing her one!!
customer_reviews.author: Talynebear

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! Very well made, durable, and functional. Great for a mom on the go or a long day of shopping to keep your hands free. Love the color (olive green) and the leather and button details. The adjustable strap is great. I like shorten the strap to hang off the back of a stroller or just carry on my shoulder and keep it long when I'm on the go. Would be great for any kind of travel.
customer_reviews.author: Ahh

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag for day to day going to and from work when I am just carrying a few things (notebook, tablet etc). I thought the quality was good and the price great. For going out and about I would rather have a bag with more usable pockets inside and out. This is one of many differently functional bags in my arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Chemmom

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag.. It is great. Looks very nice and stylish you can adjust the straps to your liking. I purchased the black one. It is very comfortable to Cary over my shoulder and fits everything.. Cell phone, full size wallet my glasses, makeup,even my small planner. It has two pockets on the inside a closed zipper compartment and a pouch under the flap in the front. You can't go wrong with this bag. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MARTY

customer_reviews.title: Good but flawed.
customer_reviews.text: Size is a little bigger than I expected. I like the roominess inside and the fabric on the outside. Two complaints: there is a lomf leatherish piece of fabric where the top flap snaps into the body of the bag and it gets very scratched super easy. It won’t ever look new. Plus the snaps were covered with a plastic that was likely to keep them from getting scratched but it was impossible to get off, even with tweeezers, so now I have these snaps that look crappy.
customer_reviews.author: Jacey Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Its okay.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of it, but its not super comfortable to wear. For some reason it doesnt seem to sit on the hip well. It seems well made besides the metal buttons. You can totally see the glue around each buttom which makes it look a little cruddy. My other issue is the way it closes. So the flap part that folds over is too long. So when you clasp the buttons, there is extra fabric that bubbles at the top. Maybe that's why it doesn't sit well. I still cant decide if its worth keeping.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag I use it as a purse. It's big enough to fit all may stuff (type 1 diabetic so all my medical supply) plus all the other essential for a purse but not bulky. I live in a city so I walk a lot the purse is very comfortable not heavy. The straps are adjustable so I can adjust it to fit perfect. It's big enough to fit my things with out being too big. I can throw small items in it while out shopping and walk home. I like that there a zipper to keep it close but an open pocket to get to things quickly woth out opening the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer1

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this bag! It is bigger than I first thought while ordering it but I love the size! I initially thought it was going to be too small but it is the perfect size! I use it as my every day purse! It is still in perfect condition, even after some rough handling on my part over the past 2 months. I would definitely buy this again and intend to buy my next bag from this maker as well :)
customer_reviews.author: HamSaucington

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but not enough pockets for organization a little annoying
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but not enough pockets for organization a little annoying. Used to have a crossbody with a total of five pockets - very useful if I need to separate my doodads and whatnots! Also front pocket has no zipper- dump hazard! I like the size if anything- and again sturdy and “pretty” in a crossbody bag sort of way! Wish it comes in brighter colors! Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Elisa T

customer_reviews.title: This bag looks nice. The size is good & it fits everything
customer_reviews.text: This bag looks nice. The size is good & it fits everything, including my iPad. The quality does leave something to be desired. The leather part on the flap is not dyed very well & the color comes off easily. They also left the plastic on the rivets when they put those in, so I had to sit there & pick it off. I need a bag & I don't want to deal with returns, so I'll keep it for now, but I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hagey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not really one to carry a purse, but needed something to carry my wallet, sunglasses, keys, etc. I absolutely love this bag. I got it yesterday and used it when I went out last night. I got the small one and it still has tons of room! I love it and may order another on in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: River Dog

customer_reviews.title: Has scratches all over-Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Came covered with scratches and the canvas looks faded! Looks nothing like the picture online. Save your money and don’t buy this product. Tried to return but was never picked up in spite of repeated reminders to customer service agents! Deeply disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: MonK

customer_reviews.title: my all time favorite amazon purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this bag for a couple months now. I never carried a bag regularly in my life until i purchased this. LOVE THIS BAG!!!!!!!!!!! love the attention to detail, the durability, the way it looks. perfect size.. i cant say anything negative about it. Im ordering more in different colors. this is one of those few items that become almost a trademark to the person wearing it. Thats how i feel anyway. Its totally me.
customer_reviews.author: Royce's mom

customer_reviews.title: VERY Sporty LOOKING
customer_reviews.text: Ladies - this item is very masculine looking. Do not purchase if you do not want something that is very rugged in appearance. Have been a prime ember for a long time and this is my first return. Unfortunately, they are charging a third of the price to return this new item still in the bag. Update: now carried it for a week and it very easy to travel with on my daily train commute. Good length and size to carry my surface pro laptop and a lot of other items.
customer_reviews.author: Xjo

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING bag!
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these as a gift about two years ago. I have used it almost every single day. I finally just bought a new one. The old one STILL is in decent shape. Definitely one of the most durable bags I’ve ever had. I love messenger bags and this one is so cute and has loads of room.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Ashleen

customer_reviews.title: like it
customer_reviews.text: okay i won't knock it down a star because it's bigger than i thought it can hold an ipad (or small chromebook "pretty much") that said ... i love it use it everyday (do wish it was a tad smaller) it's nice, functional, and matches my style
customer_reviews.author: laq

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice canvas bag, delivered fast. Everything was fine until the lining shredded at the seam of the zipped pocket. I DO NOT carry a lot in my bag as a matter of fact this is a little too big so I was shocked when the lining started to shred the bag holds hardly anything.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: The perfect travel purse!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to use on a recent vacation where I knew I would be walking for hours and unable to return to my hotel most of the day. Not only was it comfortable even when filled with a lot of items, but it also held enough to keep me from needing to access my carry-on bag on the plane. It holds a book or iPad (perhaps both, depending on the book) and anything you need to be out and and about for the day.
customer_reviews.author: WhatTheJules

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, durable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this purse! It’s very comfortable, even when weighted down with a book or whatever. It’s also very well made. It feels durable and it looks great! My only issue would be that the seller sent me a purse with scratched up leather and the replacement had animal hair and scratched up leather. I liked the way it looked so I kept the better looking one. If you can get one in excellent condition I highly recommend this awesome looking purse!
customer_reviews.author: ERINN

customer_reviews.title: A nice everyday wear kind of bag!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby got this for me for Christmas. Love it! It's slim yet roomy but not bulky. It can fit my ipad 3 with room in the front and back of it (just to give a reference as far as how long/wide the bag is). Its made of canvas with a lil piece of leather across the front. A decent length of strap so it can worn cross body without it looking like a fanny pack around your neck. Again...love it! I'm going to try to get a black one too since brown didn't really do with everything. Great price too! Nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Oh Boy !! What a Bag
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, thank you so much for my new bag. I like it a lot. I can throw it across my body and have everything in reach when I am out at the stores. Nice pockets inside. Room for a Cell phone and an out side pocket which is easy to get too. The previous smaller bag I gave to my Grand-daughter. This one I can carry my new Note Pad (3x5") and my keys, wallet and even my Kindle Fire. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Morten

customer_reviews.title: Durable, plastic around magnetic buttons a down side
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bag a few months now and I love it. Very durable. One down side is the plastic around the magnetic buttons. I can’t get it all off so it looks a bit cheesy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Rosamilia

customer_reviews.title: Not enough pockets
customer_reviews.text: I had previously owned a canvas bag and loved it. This bag is well made but it is not small. I can fit a full size book in it. Also no outside pocket which I think is necessary. Everything falls to the bottom making items difficult to find. Wish I had returned it instead of keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: mj from ohio

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for Diabetic needs!
customer_reviews.text: My child is Type 1 Diabetic and always carries a bag with their pump PDM, phone, extra pods and quick carbs, this bag works perfectly! Big enough to include school items like an assignment book and the extra pocket for pens and pencils is essential. Sturdy and great bag for us!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Bittner

customer_reviews.title: It does what it needs to do.
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag a lot but it’s just too small. Perfect for light travel but I wouldn’t recommend for someone who needs to carry more than a wallet and phone. The zipper reinforces security and the material of the bag feels pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: framthisheart

customer_reviews.title: Practical solution for travel with tablet
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that wasn't too large yet would hold my iPad and a note pad for easy travel. I have a 5x7 note pad I use for quick notes when I don't want to boot up the iPad. Both items fit nicely in the Bag along with a pen and charging cables. Pleased with the decision to purchase this item and so far it easily fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Knight

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Cary your extra stuff, like a tablet or medium sized books. ...perfect for smaller loads not enough for a full backpack. I got the brown one. Looks great: professional and relaxed at the same time without looking feminine. Construction is very durable but not rigid. Has pockets inside, not too much, but just enough to stay organized if using this for school or business work. - highly recommended for travelers, commuters or just to have when a backpack is too big.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than Advertised
customer_reviews.text: The stated measurements are 11.5" Tall x 8.2" Wide x 2.5". However, the product is less than 11" tall and less than 8" wide on the outside measurements. The interior compartments are smaller. It is barely large enough to carry a medium size library book, and that snugly. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rhoades

customer_reviews.title: Love this messenger bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this messenger bag. I travel a lot and always take small gadgets and battery back ups with me as a carry on or on the go. This bag is perfect with all the inside pockets and I like the fact that the snaps are magnetic, so much easier to open and close. Fabric is soft and shoulder strap is very comfortable. I ordered another one in green for my husband so he doesn’t steal my bag since he was already commenting on how nice it is.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my elderly mother who is several states away from me. She wanted something to hold her personal items in and keep them close to her everywhere she went. I wanted to find a travel bag similar to the one she owned. My mom was quite surprised when she received it and is very happy with her bag.
customer_reviews.author: 1stladydi

customer_reviews.title: I Like It, It's A Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice with a good size and shape. It even fits my 12" Tablet which is awesome. However, one of the features i wanted was a quick snap clasp this doesn't work. They are magnetic, but I have to make sure they snap together. One time my bag flipped over and everything fell out because the clasp wasn't secured. That is the only problem i found.
customer_reviews.author: RaeShaw

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and perfect size
customer_reviews.text: i am so glad i made the leap and bought this. i have been searching for a cross body that isn't huge but isn't tiny either. this perfect. love the outer pocket too. the material is beautiful. thinking about getting another one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Steelerfans

customer_reviews.title: Plastic on snaps
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag but am not happy about this plastic over the snaps. U cant get it off :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag-Tons of Room-Very Cool Look-Not Too Heavy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bag. It is the perfect size....roomy (about 10x12) with a generous pocket in front. Looks VERY cool. The leather gets scored kinda fast but that's okay because it's a vintage look anyway. For you ladies who aren't "girly-girls" appreciate an earthy look this unisex bag is worth every penny. Slightly weighty but not too bad (i have shoulder issues).
customer_reviews.author: JacRabbit

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag/purse for any trip or casual day!
customer_reviews.text: Great bag/purse! Love the authentic, rugged, casual and attractive look. Bought it for travel, but will use more often around town on my casual days with tshirts, jeans and tennies. Perfect side pocket for quick access-keys, chapstick and phone. Large inside holds everything else and no need to zipper it shut all the time with the flap that folds over! Even a small zipper pocket inside for lady stuff. Love this bag!!! Excellent price, great quality , it's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Denise F Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cross body purse.
customer_reviews.text: This is my everyday purse, and holds all my junk beautifully. Only complaint I have is the front pocket would have been better off with a zipper or a button. I tend to lose my kindle out of it. Luckily the kindle has a sturdy case on it.
customer_reviews.author: H.G

customer_reviews.title: Everything I was looking for in a new purse
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe the price point on this. It is a really cute, utilitarian, rustic bag. It works great as a cross body and I can fit everything I need in here without. I have only had it for about a month, but it seems to be well made and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, sturdy, travelling bag
customer_reviews.text: Good travelling bag. Sturdy material. Good stitching. Useful pockets. Comfortable across neck and shoulders (I wear it across chest so bag is in front) so it allows me to free my hands and keep an eye on the bag. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alibaba

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It's gotten compliments for it's neat lines and color, and it definitely matches my overall style. It's a little small if you want to or are used to carrying a lot of things, but I don't carry much so it works perfectly for me. Seems sturdy and since I beat up some of my bags with everyday use...at a glance, I believe this will take the wear and tear well and gain its own look from the use and still be good to keep around.
customer_reviews.author: waywardchase

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bag large enough to carry my Bible and other books while I travel, but I didn't want it to look bulky. This bag is perfect! Plenty of space to carry lots of stuff but doesn't look awkward! It's made of durable canvas and the stitching on mine is super strong. I would recommend this bag to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good I just don't like the brightness of the trimming/sewing string. It has a lot of space and pockets.
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Traveled five continents with minimum wear
customer_reviews.text: My God, what this thing has been through - travel, jungles, deserts, me being abducted in Yemen, and so on. Here I am in Florida and I accidentally spilled wine on it, somewhat ironically. Still kicking. A little bit of understandable wear and tear - nothing to be concerned about in terms of durability.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag, perfect size for me and the quality is great. One star off because the buttons came with protective film on them that I couldn't fully remove from beneath the buttons, even with tweezers it was impossible. Had to shove the remaining plastic film behind the buttons. Other than that mild annoyance, lovely little bag :)
customer_reviews.author: Oddball

customer_reviews.title: Great everything
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, weight, and color of the purse. Use it all the time. And most importantly I use it for a cross body purse to keep it near me all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Awesome Little Bag
customer_reviews.text: It looks very well made. Thick canvas. Good solid closures, etc. I use it to carry books. Has extra pockets for my e-dictionary and highlighters, etc. My iPad fits in well, too. Straps are heavy duty and the product photo is pretty true in color (photo is a little more "vivid" than actual product but it really does look as desirable in real life). I have absolutely nothing bad to say about this bag. I just love it. It's cool.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Roomy Cross sholder Messenger Bag
customer_reviews.text: A really nice canvas messenger bag. Very roomy , lots of space inside the bag for a hat, large walley, makeup bag, ect. Multiple zipper compartments inside the bag and on the outside. Adjustable strap. Nice magnetic snap to keep the purse closed. Also the purse has a zipper to keep the purse secure and closed. Can for a small 10 inch Notebook Lapp Top, and or I Pad. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Tallen

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great purse!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag!!! I had already bought one for myself about a year ago and it has no visible signs of wear and tear on the bag. My client saw mine and had to have one too! No problems at all and no dislikes!
customer_reviews.author: Lawork4me

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a unisex messenger-style bag and I found it in this one. This bag is made with canvas so it's not going to wear out anytime soon. The orange stitching is a little bit brighter than I thought it would be, but other than that I enjoy the functionality, roominess and uniqueness of this bag.
customer_reviews.author: James Mallett

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect for carrying a book, an iPad, a phone, and a wallet. I wish the inside two pockets were a little larger because the iPhone 6 Plus doesn't fit in one at all and when it is in the other it kind of skews the inside with its weight. Also I wish it had a zippered outside pocket. Other than that, it's a good looking, casual bag with a terrific strap.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Handsome Courier Bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag for an upcoming trip. However, it is too masculine for me after seeing it and the woven strap is way wider than I would prefer on a handbag. That's what makes it more appropriate for a guy. The real leather features and brass buttons do make it look expensive and it is well made. A good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Arkyelephantlover

customer_reviews.title: Fits a lot of stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. It’ fits more than necessary. It’s got a nice pocket in the inside. I think I would like a small pocket on the outside. When my purse is closed I don’t have anywhere to drop stuff. Which is actually a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Moseyonoverhere

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' it - great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Nice purse! It's very well made. Just the right size for a small tablet as well as other stuff you must have with you. It seems very well made and the material is alot thicker than i thought it would be making it very durable.
customer_reviews.author: K H

customer_reviews.title: Great for windows surface pro tablet
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a slimmer satchel for my surface since it doesn't take up as much space as a regular laptop. My tablet pc fits snug while still allowing it to zip up. It's not really designed for electronics so the padding to protect it isn't there but the material is high quality and I haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Niertis

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I prefer shoulder bags or cross body bags, so this was exactly what I was looking for. It made very well, strong material and strong seams. I use it as my regular bag. It has room for everything I need during the day. I would recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: KaysWay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect purse! I can fix everything I need. Including my tablet and note books. Now I don’t have to carry two bags for my writing stuff and purse stuff. Comfortable strap too. Doesn’t dig into shoulder even with full purse. I got the grey one. And the buttons are covered in plastic I kept mine on. But I’m sure it’ll come off pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, it holds so much. Great for traveling or everyday use. I was looking for something when we travel and this definitely fits my needs. I Love the fact you can use it as a shoulder or crossbody. I am only 5’ so an adjustable strap is a must. I was extremely happy that it’s not super long, some bags are not adjustable and a no go for me.
customer_reviews.author: K. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute purse only thing I didn’t like was that the meds logos has some plastic that I was unable to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Durable - plenty of room.
customer_reviews.text: I love the vintage feel of this bag. The canvas and worn leather give it a great look. It is light and durable and there is plenty of room to fit everything you might need for a day out. The cross body strap makes it comfortable and secure. This is my go to bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Nice daily bag.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my wife who needed a bag that wasn't too big or too small. She takes it with her every time when she has to go to work or run errands. She really likes it because it has enough space for her to put different stuff and it doesn't look bulky.
customer_reviews.author: F. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This bag has been a game changer! Perfect for traveling through Chicago! Could hold a full size female wallet, full size DSLR camera and a bunch of random stuff. It was also easy to hook a reusable water bottle through the strap metal connector
customer_reviews.author: Anesia Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad/travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic bag! I agonized over which bag to get to use with my iPad. I finally decided on this one and I am so happy with it. It’s the perfect bag for the iPad with a case on it even. There is room to carry the charger and other accessories you have with it. Has room for keys and a snack! I do wish the outside pocket was zippered but it’s not a reason to return it. Would also work as a travel purse. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Burgess

customer_reviews.title: many compliments
customer_reviews.text: I have received many complements on this bag. I use it for work carrying my laptop and cables for IT work. It gets a lot of use. I have had it for over a year now and is holding up just fine. It is softer leather. Would be nice if the base was sturdier and came with padding in the bottom. I put a thin piece of foam in to protect my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: bucky

customer_reviews.title: Nice casual shoulder bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy bag for casual, day-to-day use. Not too big, not too small, fits all the essentials easily, lightweight and easy to carry. Generous adjustable strap. The genuine leather strip on the outside is a really nice touch. My only beef is that it could use more pockets. Also, the interior pockets are just a little too small to fit my Samsung Galaxy, making it a perennial struggle to jam it in. If it wasn't for these flaws, I might give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Multi-Purpose
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to have a nice across-the-shoulder bag for traveling abroad. It fit the perfect amount of things - flip flops & coverup for the beach; phone/food/drinks while walking around. I still use it daily for work, and it holds my moleskine notebook & planner, pens, water bottle, snacks, and whatever book I happen to be reading. A years worth of use and it’s no worse for the wear. While it may not be big enough to hold some electronics, it’s perfect for convienence and portability while abroad/traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Kass

product_meta.title: Aibag Messenger Bag, Vintage Small Canvas Shoulder Crossbody Purse
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :9.25 x 2.56 x 10.63 inches; 13.6 Ounces
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :December 22, 2014
 * ASIN :B00RBEDQZY

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #32,239 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #12 inMessenger Bags 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars1,648 ratings
feature_bullets: Eco-friendly casual life style. 100% cotton canvas small messenger bag.
Main compartment & inside cellphone and zipper pocket.
Adjustable shoulder strap for easy and comfortable carrying, Can be used as a shoulder bag or cross body purse for men and women.
Overall dimension: Approx. 10.0"L x 11.8"H x 2.4"W; Fits an A4 book, iPad or 12" laptop.
Crazyhorse genuine leather decoration, there may be some scratches to make it more vintage.
